name: Admin-console Release 21.3
description: Level up your identity game with this new Admin Console release, this new release introduces new ways to access your customer identites via the Admin Console, see below for details.

ADDED.text: Added field counts for Segmentation & Data Query: All of the aggregated keyword fields such as Provider, Country etc. now show the matching profile count in the query builder itself.

Added reset button for Segmentation & Data Query: A Reset button has been added to the Customer Segmentation & Data Query sections along-side a Filter button which resets both queries and displays filtered data.

Added new Search option in Segmentation & Data query: A search box is now prepended to fields listed in the query builder under Customer Segmentation & Data Query sections to facilitate searching your data.

IMPROVED.text: Your Timezone in Customer Insights: All the sections in customer insights now display data/charts/heat maps in accordance with your configured timezone.
Bot Protection: Added new area under the Auth Security section.  By enabling this option you can enforce your customers to pass reCAPTCHA in the listed Auth APIs.
